titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to consider the feasibility of basing the basic formula price for milk under Federal milk marketing orders on the costs of production for dairy farmers and the benefits to farmers and consumers of such a pricing approach.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry.

bill.summary: 3/20/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to consider basing the milk marketing order basic formula price on dairy farmer milk production costs.
